entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add IEnumerator.CanReset #103855
  • Arm64/Sve: GatherVector* tests are failing for MinOpts #103854
  • Assert in InsertPInvokeMethodEpilog #103853
  • JIT: ARM64 - SVE cover destructive forms of ExtractVector and Splice #103850
    Future

Closed

  • Light up IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher for AVX512 #93222
    9.0.0
  • Debug assertion failure in System.Net.Http.HttpConnection.SendAsync #100616
    9.0.0
  • Consider emitting unicode escape sequences for character ranges in the regex source generator #103840
  • Regex with negated non-ascii ranges emits empty `IndexOfAnyExcept` check #103842
  • .unaligned prefix ignored on initblk and cpblk #5236
    Future
  • EventSourceLogger does not propagate SpanId and TraceId #76718
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] collect garbage when memory is low #103857
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation in `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #103856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use minipal toupper/lower in corehost #103852
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Remove unused members on Module - crossgen remnants #103848
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 - Added SVE APIs `ExtractLastVector`, `ExtractLastScalar`, `ExtractAfterLastVector`, `ExtractAfterLastScalar` #103847
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve

Merged

  • Add test case for `IDynamicInterfaceCastable` on `ValueType`s. #103849
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Add Avx512 support to IndexOfAnyAsciiSearcher #103710
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Improve a couple of regex source generator oddities #103851
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Improve use of PAL's RawData for X509Certificate #103828
    area-System.Security
  • [Logging.EventSource] Add trace correlation fields #103655
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Enbale TYP_MASK support for ARM64 #103818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve

Updated

  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Update HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to use a binary search #103778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2480023 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Clean up JSON property lookup logic and add alternate key lookup support. #103836
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Create new X509CertificateLoader #102167
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stack allocate unescaped boxes #103361
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize out write barriers for fields in ref-like structs #103503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Synchronized description of destinationDirectoryName parameter #100330
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Extract shared IL pattern analysis to a class #103701
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add riscv64 arch to tracing/eventpipe/processinfo tests #103832
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Vectorize a few more conversions in TensorPrimitives.ConvertXx #103820
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • NativeAOT the XUnitLogChecker #103795
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Added SVE APIs - `Test*`, `ExtractVector` #103739
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [cdac] start of Metadata contract; implement GetMethodTableData SOS method #103444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Make DAC return Module instead of PEAssembly for DacpModuleData::PEAssembly #103821
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono] Use correct cast_class for IntPtr[] #103841
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Reduce some allocations in SslStream handshake. #103814
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Question] [NativeAOT-LLVM] What defines if jobs has a `Initialize containers` step? #2618

PullRequests

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet build for VSIX project with VSSDK fails with MSB4062 for CompareBuildTaskVersion #12421
    Discussion

Updated

  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • SDK should expose available WarningLevel values as MSBuild items #24570
  • NET SDK with Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.SDK dependency results in System.Text.Json - File not found through when specifying NET SDK Version #39152
  • List non-project references from CLI #9527
    Backlog
  • dotnet tool install failed with DirectoryNotFoundException #40039
    9.0.1xx
  • File extension ".sln" is sometimes required and other times not #18739
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Containers telemetry #41747
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Avoid reinstall tool already installed #41746
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Error condition fix Fixes #40297 #41741
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error in 【MSBuildWorkspace.Create() .OpenSolutionAsync()】：System.Exception (cannotfound BuildHost) #74070
  • Accessibility issue in document outline window. #73810
    17.11 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use ITextDifferencingService.DiffSnapshotSpans instead of allocating full buffer text during codeaction previews #74114
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractProjectExtensionProvider.FilterExtensions #74112
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove copilot analysis code #74111
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • On the fly docs - add telemetry regarding documentation comments #74088
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Reduce time spent in ConflictResolver.Session.GetNodesOrTokensToCheckForConflicts #74101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid re-running all codeaction requests at low priority. #74083
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add a cancellation on typing for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: NullReferenceException when projecting out an owned entity which doesn't own additional entity types #34068
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Projecting out owned entities which own additional entity types retrieves the entire document #34067
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect nullability annotations for FromSqlRaw/ExecuteSqlRaw parameters #34064
    9.0.0
  • Primitive Collections with ValueConverters #34063
  • Cannot create a DbSet because this type is not included in the model for the context #34060

Closed

  • Cosmos: handle fake LeftJoins in query tree #33969

PullRequests

Created

  • Small: Report cross-document join exception on Cosmos, and some test cleanup #34066
  • FromSql work #34065
  • Cosmos: Fixes around array projection #34061

Merged

  • Some code cleanup/style #34062
  • fixing cosmos test failures on linux (#34058) #34059
  • fixing cosmos test failures on linux #34058

Updated

  • Implement `IS [NOT] DISTINCT FROM` translation #34048
  • Index convention changes for non-relational providers #34054
    providers-beware
